name: Space Base
description:
notice: currently the game is in Spanish since it is the first version and was created in Argentina missions. follow me to watch for updatesfunny

It is a 2d platform game in pixel art style or something retro for two players on the same keyboard as a survival coop with excellent game mechanics to have a good time trying to get further and further.

mechanical

According to the keyboard controls you use, you will be a character, the engineer (green), the soldier (red), who have their own tasks and objectives to stay alive, both players fully depend on each other

difficulty

As you advance defeating the hordes of enemies, more types of aliens with different abilities and more difficulty are added, these bugs will make your life impossible.

personalization

you can choose different types of character colors and the masks that both players will wear

information

Between the main menu and survival mode open a layout where the information of the characters will appear, how to also play the objective of the game, the level of the player with a maximum of 2, the enemies: how they are, what they do and how to kill them.
